      • disableTrigger

        public void disableTrigger(java.lang.String triggerId)
                    throws TriggerNotFoundException,
                           SchedulerException
        Disables the Trigger. If the Trigger is disabled it will not execute.
        Parameters:
        triggerId - the string that uniquely identifies the Trigger to be disabled
        Throws:
        TriggerNotFoundException - if there is no Trigger that matches triggerId
        SchedulerException

      • deleteTrigger

        public void deleteTrigger(java.lang.String triggerGroup,
                          java.lang.String triggerId)
                   throws TriggerNotFoundException,
                          SchedulerException
        Deletes/Removes the Trigger. If it is a ScheduledTrigger then it is also un-scheduled from scheduler.
        Parameters:
        triggerId - the string that uniquely identifies the Trigger to be removed
        Throws:
        TriggerNotFoundException - if there is no Trigger that matches triggerId
        SchedulerException

      • execute

        public void execute(java.lang.String triggerId)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes the Trigger.
        Parameters:
        triggerId - the string that uniquely identifies the Trigger to be executed
        Throws:
        TriggerNotFoundException - if there is no Trigger that matches triggerId
        java.lang.Exception - if an exception occurred during the execution of the Trigger
